profile-description.part1: I confidently devote myself to studying new technologies. My progress in solving problems is evident on Codewars.
profile-description.part2: I aspire to work in a team of individuals with whom we can collectively create value.
profile-description.part3: I am goal-oriented, communicative, and have a sense of humor. Collaborating within a team brings me great pleasure.
profile-description.part4: My English is at an intermediate level, and my German is at the B2 level.
